title: It_Is_2022_AD
author: It_Is_2022_AD
content: Hello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: Are you looking for a specific rank or is anyone eligible ? Anyways here's my telegram: @aram4fs7.  reach out anytime!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Give me details on telegram @rat03gopoh,I also have idle signature and avatar space

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: interested... did you plan to escrow funds?what you mean 8 hours daily? (it's a full time job?)BTW here my telegram "user276514"

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.Do you mean to post on several forums for your company/website? Is there a need to promote any referral links? Which types of forum posters do you need? I mean what is the forum type where I need to post? It is a crypto related forum or forex related forum or something different.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: HiCould you clearly narrates their core duties what to do as poster. Do you intend to run a signature campaign or why do you need poster. Most at times you need to clearly states their functions and task involved to enable them know what they are applying for.Please you may discard if you already explained everything on TG.Thank you.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on October 31, 2022, 06:49:55 PMHiCould you clearly narrates their core duties what to do as poster. Do you intend to run a signature campaign or why do you need poster. Most at times you need to clearly states their functions and task involved to enable them know what they are applying for.Please you may discard if you already explained everything on TG.Thank you.I don't think there's the intention to run a signature campaign, because it's an open application with no rank requirement he could be asking or paying to post on other forums, there's not much information he only wants a telegram to screen those who can qualify, but at least OP should give us information so people here know what kind of tasks as forum posters, are they are going to forums or they are going to post here and what niche they are promoting is it a Cryptocurrency related.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I see folks rushed to apply without even knowing what kind of task they are supposed to do or even being assured the payment funds will be escrowed. What if OP is looking accounts that can bump threads or shill certain projects?No way, a signature campaign is applied using Telegram handles

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on October 31, 2022, 05:22:15 PMQuote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.Do you mean to post on several forums for your company/website? Is there a need to promote any referral links? Which types of forum posters do you need? I mean what is the forum type where I need to post? It is a crypto related forum or forex related forum or something different.OP has not shared any details here publically and may not tell even after asking here.But i see many people share their telegram handle so that OP could contact them. So can anyone tell if OP contacted him and what did he offer? It is good that someone can make all this information public here so the experienced members can see and comments if the services required by him are legit.

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.I know what you're looking for. I've worked before. Somethings you might want to know about me -- Fluent in English- Hardworking- Available 8+ hours- Hates plagiarism If it is what I think, I'm IN.Here my telegram : @M3RC303S

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram. Let me see what's your really looking for and to find out what task does the postersneed to do..here's my telegram @PrinceRiel27

comments.author: Docnaster
comments.body: Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.If you can spell out the kind of job that is required here it will help you attract quality applicants. Telegram : Dockoin
